document.full_text: pakistan's interior minister said on sunday he was "98 percent sure" senior al qaeda figure ilyas kashmiri had been killed in a u.s. drone strike near the afghan border.
document.title: pakistan minister says kashmiri is very likely dead
lines_and_colors: pakistan's interior minister said on sunday he was "98 percent sure" senior al qaeda figure ilyas kashmiri had been killed in a u.s. drone strike near the afghan border.
